experiences.description:
• Co-designing the Sales Copilot application, leading to the acquisition of new customers and the pivot to Signal Based Selling.
• Implementing the Chrome extension version of our Sales Copilot application, including embedding it into Gong.
• Actively participate in the setup of Github Actions for CI/CD, and migrating pipelines from CircleCI.
• Co-create the product roadmap in collaboration with PMs.
• Occasionally collaborate with data engineers on services based on Airflow and Python.
Migrating order management system to React, with the use of CSS-in-JS and Bitbucket Pipelines
Worked as a technical consultant for various clients, delivering high-quality solutions.

subExperiences.description: Actively worked for RMC BFM on the migration of CI/CD pipelines to Github Actions, including end-to-end tests based on Selenium.
Designing and implementing an application for managing air freights for Groupe ADP (formerly Aéroports de Paris) while collaborating with C#/.NET backend developers.

Designing and implementing a map service to help SNCF engineers manage and find tools marked with QR codes, and plan their itinerary inside the technical center of Les Ardoines, reducing a lot of back and forth.

experiences.description:
• Designing and implementing a check-in PWA application for event hosts
• Actively participate in technological watch and security talks, leading the company to be able to sell more web-based products and acquiring new customers
